translation: Break through the enemy lines.{#Name="説明文"}
source: Break through the enemy lines.{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the Undead!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the Undead!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the Undead Gigas!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the Undead Gigas!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Oh God, she's here!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Oh God, she's here!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Who?{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Who?{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Her! You know...the one!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Her! You know...the one!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: The one what? Speak English, you idiot!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: The one what? Speak English, you idiot!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Curse you, demon! I'll fight you as long as I've got life in me!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Curse you, demon! I'll fight you as long as I've got life in me!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Our forest will be lost...{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Our forest will be lost...{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: They don't have it yet! Keep fighting!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: They don't have it yet! Keep fighting!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: That devilish songstress is horrifying... I think I'm gonna be sick!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: That devilish songstress is horrifying... I think I'm gonna be sick!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Pull yourself together, man!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Pull yourself together, man!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Dammit! We have to go on the offensive!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Dammit! We have to go on the offensive!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: We're out of formation!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: We're out of formation!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Hold your ground! The traitor must be punished for her crimes!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Hold your ground! The traitor must be punished for her crimes!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Wounded soldier coming through! Is there a medic here?{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Wounded soldier coming through! Is there a medic here?{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: What a horrifying sight...{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: What a horrifying sight...{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: It's a dragon! And it's...attacking!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: It's a dragon! And it's...attacking!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Do we retreat? Do we advance!? We need our orders!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Do we retreat? Do we advance!? We need our orders!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Stop them! Hold your ground!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Stop them! Hold your ground!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Charge! We have naught to fear from a dragon!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Charge! We have naught to fear from a dragon!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Why is a dragon even here?{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Why is a dragon even here?{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Don't ask questions about it! Just kill it!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Don't ask questions about it! Just kill it!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Just once...before I died...I wanted to spend...a night with Lady Three...{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Just once...before I died...I wanted to spend...a night with Lady Three...{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Give me a report!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Give me a report!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: My unit's gone! They're all gone!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: My unit's gone! They're all gone!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Damnit! How many hundreds has this mad songstress killed...?{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Damnit! How many hundreds has this mad songstress killed...?{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: All right, it's a new day, we've got a new ship—it's time to set sail and conquer the world!{#Name="Zero"}
source: All right, it's a new day, we've got a new ship—it's time to set sail and conquer the world!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: We did it! We got her!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: We did it! We got her!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: We've slain the demon!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: We've slain the demon!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: KA-BOOM! We did it! Intoner down! Intoner down! Did you see that? Nailed her right in the—{LF}{LF}Gaaahh!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: KA-BOOM! We did it! Intoner down! Intoner down! Did you see that? Nailed her right in the—{LF}{LF}Gaaahh!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Lady Three's gonna be overjoyed!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Lady Three's gonna be overjoyed!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Woo-hoo! Yeah, baby, YEAH! Ha ha ha ha! (follow Japanese closely; some grunts and stuff mixed in here too){#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Woo-hoo! Yeah, baby, YEAH! Ha ha ha ha! (follow Japanese closely; some grunts and stuff mixed in here too){#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: After all the trouble I went through to get that goddamn airship...{#Name="Zero"}
source: After all the trouble I went through to get that goddamn airship...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I'm gonna slice the shit out of every last one of you!{#Name="Zero"}
source: I'm gonna slice the shit out of every last one of you!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Halt! Stay back, or else!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Halt! Stay back, or else!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Or else what!?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Or else what!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Wow, Z. Scary.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Wow, Z. Scary.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: W-Wait! We can still talk about this!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: W-Wait! We can still talk about this!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Sorry, pal. Talking time's over!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Sorry, pal. Talking time's over!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You sons of bitches ruined my brand-new{LF}airship...and now you're going to DIE!{#Name="Zero"}
source: You sons of bitches ruined my brand-new{LF}airship...and now you're going to DIE!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: It would appear Lady Zero was very much{LF}looking forward to airship travel.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: It would appear Lady Zero was very much{LF}looking forward to airship travel.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Seems like it.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Seems like it.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Hey! ...Hmm? Where'd he go?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Hey! ...Hmm? Where'd he go?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: He?{#Name="Decadus"}
source: He?{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Mikhail. She's not a big fan of using his name.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Mikhail. She's not a big fan of using his name.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Why not?{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Why not?{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Because I'm a jerk, mostly.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Because I'm a jerk, mostly.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Such a...devious game to play.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Such a...devious game to play.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Ah ha ha ha ha ha! Die, bastards! Die!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Ah ha ha ha ha ha! Die, bastards! Die!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Such a demon, laughing as she murders!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Such a demon, laughing as she murders!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Why does Lady Zero engage in such...{LF}senseless slaughter?{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Why does Lady Zero engage in such...{LF}senseless slaughter?{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Aw, she's just pissed about the airship.{LF}It's kinda cute.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Aw, she's just pissed about the airship.{LF}It's kinda cute.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Unngh... So cruel...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Unngh... So cruel...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Watch. She'll torment 'em half to death.{LF}...Well, more like ALL to death.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Watch. She'll torment 'em half to death.{LF}...Well, more like ALL to death.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Nnngh... How painful...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Nnngh... How painful...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Oh, God... Help me! Help meeeeee!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Oh, God... Help me! Help meeeeee!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Oh, you're way past help, jackass!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Oh, you're way past help, jackass!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You bust up my airship, and now you want HELP!?{#Name="Zero"}
source: You bust up my airship, and now you want HELP!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Well, technically it wasn't{LF}YOUR airship, exactly...{#Name="Dito"}
source: Well, technically it wasn't{LF}YOUR airship, exactly...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: For Lady Three!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: For Lady Three!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: I wish to live a long and healthy life!{LF}Er, for Lady Three!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: I wish to live a long and healthy life!{LF}Er, for Lady Three!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Ow! Dammit, this ivy's all pokey and it hurts!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Ow! Dammit, this ivy's all pokey and it hurts!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Mmm... The pain is...delectable...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Mmm... The pain is...delectable...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: You're a strange man, Decadus.{LF}You know that, right?{#Name="Dito"}
source: You're a strange man, Decadus.{LF}You know that, right?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Hmm... That giant tree sure stands out, doesn't it?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Hmm... That giant tree sure stands out, doesn't it?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Indeed. Perhaps Lady Three is there?{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Indeed. Perhaps Lady Three is there?{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Let's go. I'm gonna kill her for what she did to my airship.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Let's go. I'm gonna kill her for what she did to my airship.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Um, weren't you gonna kill her anyway?{#Name="Dito"}
source: Um, weren't you gonna kill her anyway?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Dammit! What the hell!?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Dammit! What the hell!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Blocked in by walls of ivy...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Blocked in by walls of ivy...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: This is seriously getting on my nerves!{#Name="Zero"}
source: This is seriously getting on my nerves!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Lady Zero! These foes are undead!{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Lady Zero! These foes are undead!{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Yeah, I can see that! ...Hell, I can SMELL it!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Yeah, I can see that! ...Hell, I can SMELL it!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Enough circling around...{LF}Get over here and fight me!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Enough circling around...{LF}Get over here and fight me!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Just imagine all that ivy{LF}binding up all around you...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Just imagine all that ivy{LF}binding up all around you...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Yep. It's like you died and{LF}went to freakshow heaven.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Yep. It's like you died and{LF}went to freakshow heaven.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Nnnngh...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Nnnngh...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Take it easy. Zero's gonna knee you{LF}in the junk if you get too excited.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Take it easy. Zero's gonna knee you{LF}in the junk if you get too excited.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: She...she WILL? Oh, just the thought...{LF}Unnnghhh...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: She...she WILL? Oh, just the thought...{LF}Unnnghhh...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: くそっ、面倒な場所に逃げこみやがって！{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: くそっ、面倒な場所に逃げこみやがって！{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: 逃げてなくて、最初から居たんだけどね{#Name="ディト"}
source: 逃げてなくて、最初から居たんだけどね{#Name="ディト"}

translation: うるさいっ！{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: うるさいっ！{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: お～こわいこわい！{#Name="ディト"}
source: お～こわいこわい！{#Name="ディト"}

translation: Argh! My gut's killing me...{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Argh! My gut's killing me...{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Cramps!?{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Cramps!?{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: No!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: No!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Diarrhea!?{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Diarrhea!?{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: NO! I've been slashed in the stomach, you idiot!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: NO! I've been slashed in the stomach, you idiot!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Damn... Are we doomed to die here?{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Damn... Are we doomed to die here?{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Death to the accursed Intoner!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Death to the accursed Intoner!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: I'm the only one bringing death around here!{#Name="Zero"}
source: I'm the only one bringing death around here!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I'll draw Zero's attention!{LF}You try to get behind her!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: I'll draw Zero's attention!{LF}You try to get behind her!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Got it!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Got it!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Cute plan. Too bad I can hear you, dumbass!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Cute plan. Too bad I can hear you, dumbass!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Sooo, I haven't seen your dumb dragon for a while.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Sooo, I haven't seen your dumb dragon for a while.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: I pray he's not in danger.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: I pray he's not in danger.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: He's fine. Idiots like him never die young.{#Name="Zero"}
source: He's fine. Idiots like him never die young.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Dammit, the more we walk, the greener{LF}this place gets. I'm sick of it!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Dammit, the more we walk, the greener{LF}this place gets. I'm sick of it!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You sure do bitch a lot, Z. You know that?{#Name="Dito"}
source: You sure do bitch a lot, Z. You know that?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: It seems as though our lady is{LF}growing angrier by the moment.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: It seems as though our lady is{LF}growing angrier by the moment.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Whaddya expect? Her dragon's gone,{LF}and we can't find Three.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Whaddya expect? Her dragon's gone,{LF}and we can't find Three.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: But uh, I wouldn't broach that subject,{LF}or she might turn your balls into pudding.{#Name="Dito"}
source: But uh, I wouldn't broach that subject,{LF}or she might turn your balls into pudding.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Ooooooh...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Ooooooh...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Faerie"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Faerie"}

translation: Hello! I'm a faerie! A whimsical faerie!{#Name="Faerie"}
source: Hello! I'm a faerie! A whimsical faerie!{#Name="Faerie"}

translation: Aw, just look at you poor fools!{#Name="Faerie"}
source: Aw, just look at you poor fools!{#Name="Faerie"}

translation: All slack-jawed and clueless...{#Name="Faerie"}
source: All slack-jawed and clueless...{#Name="Faerie"}

translation: It's pretty hard to watch!{#Name="Faerie"}
source: It's pretty hard to watch!{#Name="Faerie"}

translation: I mean, how can you even live like that?{#Name="Faerie"}
source: I mean, how can you even live like that?{#Name="Faerie"}

translation: Aren't you embarrassed to be seen out in public?{#Name="Faerie"}
source: Aren't you embarrassed to be seen out in public?{#Name="Faerie"}

translation: Oh boo hoo! We lost our dragon! We don't know where he is!{#Name="Faerie"}
source: Oh boo hoo! We lost our dragon! We don't know where he is!{#Name="Faerie"}

translation: And yet, he's waiting in the Valley of Faeries juuust ahead!{#Name="Faerie"}
source: And yet, he's waiting in the Valley of Faeries juuust ahead!{#Name="Faerie"}

translation: Well, have fun being lost like a bunch of stupi—{#Name="Faerie"}
source: Well, have fun being lost like a bunch of stupi—{#Name="Faerie"}

translation: Right then. Off we go.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Right then. Off we go.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: After murdering Four,{#Name="199"}
source: After murdering Four,{#Name="199"}

translation: Zero flew off to her next destination—the Land of Forests.{#Name="289"}
source: Zero flew off to her next destination—the Land of Forests.{#Name="289"}

translation: It was a place steeped in insanity, and the home of her sister, Three...{#Name="433"}
source: It was a place steeped in insanity, and the home of her sister, Three...{#Name="433"}

translation: All right, it's a new day, we've got a new ship—{LF}it's time to set sail and conquer the world!{#Name="Zero"}
source: All right, it's a new day, we've got a new ship—{LF}it's time to set sail and conquer the world!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: We did it! We got her!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: We did it! We got her!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: We've slain the demon!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: We've slain the demon!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: KA-BOOM! We did it! Intoner down! Intoner down!{LF}Did you see that? Nailed her right in the—{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: KA-BOOM! We did it! Intoner down! Intoner down!{LF}Did you see that? Nailed her right in the—{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Lady Three's gonna be overjoyed!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Lady Three's gonna be overjoyed!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Woo-hoo! Yeah, baby, YEAH! Ha ha ha ha!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Woo-hoo! Yeah, baby, YEAH! Ha ha ha ha!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: After all the trouble I went through to get that goddamn airship...{#Name="Zero"}
source: After all the trouble I went through to get that goddamn airship...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I am gonna slice the shit out of every last one of you!{#Name="Zero"}
source: I am gonna slice the shit out of every last one of you!{#Name="Zero"}
